publishes.name: content-delivery.booked
publishes.summary: Event represents the content booking is successfully made.

publishes.name: content-delivery.cancelled
publishes.summary: Event represents the conetent booking is cancelled.

markdown.content:
Monarch is a QubeWire subsystem that deals with orchestrating the deliveries. It receives the booking, handles approval process, asks the dispatcher to prepare plan for the delivery, syncs the delivery status from delivery systems, and manages cancellation.

<NodeGraph />
